title: Client started to restore
body:
I was in lobby for ranked and it got to the point where the game would've started(champ loading screen) but instead, the client began to repair itself

edit: the game was surrendered early due to me being afk because of client repair

replies.body:
Client repairs can happen at the most unfortunate of times, but that repair/crash was going to happen eventually since some of the game files were damaged or corrupted. It's better that it happened before a game started, otherwise it could have crashed at a pivotal point in the game. 

Run through this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to make sure everything is working properly just in case, and test it in a custom/practice match.
